docs.snippet: Government officials from the two countries have hardly worked in lock step in the FIFA corruption case. Swiss authorities are said to be wary of appearing as puppets of the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: Government officials from the two countries have hardly worked in lock step in the FIFA corruption case. Swiss authorities are said to be wary of appearing as puppets of the United States.
docs.abstract: Switzerland is helping United States with FIFA corruption case, but warily; FIFA investigators could jeopardize organization's cooperative stand if they do not share documents with United States, yet according to Swiss law they could face jail time for sharing documents with United States.

headline.main: In FIFA Inquiry, Switzerland Aids U.S. but Is Wary of Being Eclipsed
headline.print_headline: Switzerland Helps U.S., but Warily, in FIFA Case

docs.snippet: Heroin traffickers linked to the abduction and disappearance of 43 students a year ago are battling over millions of dollars paid by Canadian mining giant Goldcorp to a village in Mexico's southern gold belt, leading to a wave of murders....
docs.lead_paragraph: Heroin traffickers linked to the abduction and disappearance of 43 students a year ago are battling over millions of dollars paid by Canadian mining giant Goldcorp to a village in Mexico's southern gold belt, leading to a wave of murders.

headline.main: Brutal Cartels Fight Over Mexico's 'Conflict-Free' Gold Revenues
headline.print_headline: Brutal Cartels Fight Over Mexico's 'Conflict-Free' Gold Revenues

docs.snippet: The San Bernardino killers had been radicalized "for quite some time" and had taken target practice at area gun ranges, in one instance just days before the attack that left 14 people dead, the FBI said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The San Bernardino killers had been radicalized "for quite some time" and had taken target practice at area gun ranges, in one instance just days before the attack that left 14 people dead, the FBI said Monday.

headline.main: FBI: Killers Had Been Radicalized 'for Quite Some Time'
headline.print_headline: FBI: Killers Had Been Radicalized 'for Quite Some Time'

docs.snippet: Why would an 82-year-old man kill his son, his daughter, his wife and himself?...
docs.lead_paragraph: Why would an 82-year-old man kill his son, his daughter, his wife and himself?
docs.abstract: Killing by 82-year-old Frank Stack of his ailing wife and intellectually-disabled adult son and daughter, followed by his own suicide in Elmhurst, Ill, has left some puzzling over his motive; some speculate Stack feared treatment his children would receive in group homes where they had been living for years once their aging parents were deceased.
